title: Steve Jobs widow calls new movie fiction
text:
Steve Jobs' widow calls new movie 'fiction' 
CNN Money Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Cook told Stephen Colbert on the "Late Show" last month. "I think that a lot of people are trying to be opportunistic, and I hate this. It's not a great part of our world." Yet others who knew Jobs said they enjoyed the new movie, which hits theaters on Friday. Jobs' co-founder...
